  Sai S Pavuluri 
+1-609-865-9418  
saipavuluri7@gmail.com 
 
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY 
 
✓ Highly skilled professional with more than 16 years of experience in Information technology. 
✓ Software applications analysis, design, and development. 
✓ Experience  in  Requirements  analysis, Development of  test  scripts, Scripting  for  test  automation, Execution  of 
scripts, Test Summary Report, Traceability Matrix and analyzing the test results. 
✓ Development of programs using SQL scripts. 
✓ Development of automation scripts. 
✓ Performed log analysis and reports. 
✓ Verification and validation of Single sign-on (SSO) functionalities.  
✓ Testing of data flow between Identity and Access Management system and LDAP / Active Directory. 
✓ Experience  in  creating  test  cases  for  performing  all  types  of  testing  primarily  focusing  on  Web  Based  Testing, 
Database Testing. 
✓ Performed Test Automation and controlling the quality with technical skill set.

Database Testing. 
✓ Performed Test Automation and controlling the quality with technical skill set. 
✓ Development of automation framework of web based and windows-based applications. 
✓ Proven excellence in automation through QTP automation tool. 
✓ In-depth knowledge of Software Testing Life Cycle (STLC) & Software Development Cycle (SDLC) 
✓ Experienced in different QA testing methodologies like AGILE & WATERFALL 
✓ Extensive experience in Smoke, Integration, Functional, Regression, System and Acceptance testing by using Black 
& White Box testing techniques. 
✓ Expertise  in  problem  solving  and  bug  tracking  reports  using  Bug  Tracking  tools  like  HP  ALM,  QUALITY  CENTER, 
Clarify, BUGZILLA, Rally and JIRA 
✓ Good Knowledge of Web services Testing using SOAPUI. 
✓ Participated in the Project Kick off meeting, Requirements walk through and Audit meetings. 
✓ Experienced in Test closure phase by creating Test Summary report and the different quality measurement forms

✓ Experienced in Test closure phase by creating Test Summary report and the different quality measurement forms 
for the entire project and attended Project Closeout meetings. 
✓ Managed and worked on all levels of testing like Integration Testing, VIT (Vendor Integration testing) and UAT 
✓ Proven   ability   to   support   multiple   projects,   under   Tight   Deadlines,   often   with   competing   priorities   and 
complexities. 
✓ Key player in building the Agile team from scratch and delivering high quality products. 
✓ Knowledge of agile methodology and frameworks like Scrum, Kanban. 
✓ Implemented   OSAM   framework   by   Facilitating   PI   Planning,   Product   Backlogs   Grooming,   Sprint   Planning, 
Retrospective and Show and Tell and assist the product owner. 
✓ Extensive experience working closely with product owners and project managers to prioritize backlog.

Retrospective and Show and Tell and assist the product owner. 
✓ Extensive experience working closely with product owners and project managers to prioritize backlog. 
✓ Acted as Scrum Master for Product teams with a focus on guiding the teams towards improving the way they work. 
✓ Regularly conducted Scrum Stand up Meetings and maintain Burn Up and Burndown Charts. 
✓ Assisted team to remove impediments by understanding the control and release processes. 
 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
 
✓ Project Management tools such as JIRA, Azure DEVOPS, Confluence, Figma and Rally. 
✓ Test Management Tools - HP Quality Center, ALM, Clarify, Bugzilla, MS-Excel. 
✓ Tools – IAM, Automation Scripting, QTP, Active Directory, Jenkins, Vault, SOAP, HTML, Web Services. 
✓ Product Management Tools – SharePoint, MS Office. 
✓ Databases - MS SQL Server, Oracle 12c/10g. 
✓ Operating Systems - Windows XP/Vista. 
 
EDUCATION & CERTIFICATIONS 
 
✓ Certified - Project Management Professional (PMP) – 2020.

✓ Certified - Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe) 4.0 Agilist – 2016 
✓ Certified - Professional Scrum Master (PSM) – 2016. 
✓ Certified - Professional, Academy for HealthCare Management (PAHM) – 2014. 
✓ Certified - ISTQB-ISEB Foundation Level, Testing Board, United Kingdom – 2011. 
✓ Masters in Tele Communication Engineering - La Trobe University, Melbourne, Australia – 2006. 
✓ Masters in Electronics - Nagarjuna University, India – 2003. 
✓ Bachelors in Electronics - Nagarjuna University, India - 2001.

Pyramid Consulting, Inc. Feb 2022 to Till Date 
Designation: Consultant / Project Manager 
Client: Jack Henry & Associates and Macy’s Technology 
Responsibilities: 
 
✓ Working closely with the Client & the team daily. 
✓ Expertise in identifying the risks, having mitigation plans. 
✓ Make sure the team is having a healthy backlog. 
✓ Monitor and report the committed work on daily basis.

Maintaining healthy Product Backlog, Sprint Planning, Daily Standups, Product Demos, Retrospections, 
Updating JIRA on regular basis, Show and Tell, Scrum of scrums, SIT Demos. 
✓ Ensure deliverables are up to quality standards at the end of each sprint. 
✓ Guide development teams to higher scrum maturity. 
✓ Build a productive environment where team members ‘own’ the product and enjoy working on it. 
✓ Sending out sprint reports with high level status on accomplishments, blockers, next sprint deliverables. 
✓ Managing 2 different scrum teams at one given time. 
✓ Resolve conflicts and remove obstacles that occur. 
✓ Being the point of contact for external communications.

features from concept to launch in a fast-paced environment.

✓ Design, Review, and Execute and Analyze test cases using tools like HP ALM, Quality Center, Clarify, 
Bugzilla and JIRA. Experience in DB Testing by writing SQL Scripts.
